alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McMullen County through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Loma Alta, or 16 miles south of Tilden, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern McMullen County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
